mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no AS board_no, b.board_title AS board_title, b.board_content AS board_content, b.write_date AS write_date, b.employee_no AS employee_no, b.viewcnt AS viewcnt, e.employee_name AS employee_name FROM board b JOIN employees e ON b.employee_no = e.employee_no ORDER BY board_no DESC
